trans-unit.source: Defines the behavior for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> associated with a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define o comportamento para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> associado com um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use WorkflowRuntimeBehavior to access the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object in your workflow service.
trans-unit.target: Usam o WorkflowRuntimeBehavior para acessar o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>objeto em seu serviço de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is added by default when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> is created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>objeto é adicionado por padrão quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost>é criado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A> property to 10 minutes.
Not implemented in <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior"></xref>.
Not implemented.
Not implemented.
Not implemented.
Not implemented.
Configures the workflow service to support the workflow run-time behavior.
trans-unit.target: Configura o serviço de fluxo de trabalho para dar suporte o comportamento de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A> extension and configures it for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método cria um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A>extensão e o configura para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The service description.
The service host.
Gets or sets a value that indicates how long a workflow instance stays in-memory in the idle state before it is forcibly removed from memory.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica como o tempo uma fluxo de trabalho instância permanece na memória no estado ocioso antes que ele é removido de modo forçado da memória.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> object indicating how long a workflow instance stays in-memory in the idle state before it is forcibly removed from memory.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.TimeSpan>objeto indicando como tempo uma fluxo de trabalho instância permanece na memória no estado ocioso antes que ele forçará é removido da memória.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Verifies the scheduling service used for workflow services has been added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> object and that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> object has not started before the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Open*>.
trans-unit.target: Verifica o serviço de agendamento usado para serviços de fluxo de trabalho foi adicionado para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> objeto e que o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> objeto não foi iniciada antes da chamada para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Open*>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Open*>

trans-unit.source: The service description.
The service host.
The wrong <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService"></xref> is registered.
Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> associated with a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> associado com um <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is not initialized before retrieving this property, then a new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is created.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>não é possível inicializar o objeto antes de recuperar essa propriedade, em seguida, um novo <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>objeto é criado.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> object.
